warning.title: EDUCATIONAL USE ONLY - LEGAL WARNING
warning.text: This tool is designed for <1>educational and authorized security testing purposes only</1>. Unauthorized access to computer systems is illegal. Only use this scanner on systems you own or have explicit written permission to test. Misuse of this tool may result in criminal prosecution.
warning.footer: RscScan | Next.js Server Actions Prototype Pollution RCE

empty_state.title: Ready to Scan
empty_state.description: Configure your DNS endpoint and upload a target list to begin scanning for RscScan vulnerabilities.

header.demo_toggle: Toggle demo mode for safe testing

settings.title: Settings
settings.request_timeout_desc: Maximum time to wait for each request (1-60 seconds)
settings.auto_save_desc: Automatically save scan results after completion
settings.minimize_tray_desc: Keep app running in background when window is closed

config.title: Scan Configuration
config.description: Configure DNS endpoint and target list
config.dns_help: Enter your DNS exfiltration endpoint (e.g., Burp Collaborator, Interactsh)
config.target_placeholder: Enter URLs (one per line) or drag & drop file...
config.upload_help: Upload a text file with one URL per line
config.demo_notice: Demo Mode Active: Scan will use simulated data instead of making real HTTP requests.

validation.targets_required: Please add at least one target URL

about.title: About RscScan
about.description: RscScan is a specialized security tool developed to detect
about.description_end: vulnerabilities. It helps security researchers and developers identify potential RCE vectors in Next.js applications.
about.guidance_text: This project was developed under the guidance and educational content provided by PentesterLand Academy.
